section_title: SESSION THREE: ELEMENTS OF NEEDS ASSESSMENTS
sentences: The session on elements of needs assessments convened on Tuesday afternoon, 23 April.

Delegates began by examining the participatory process in assessing technology needs, considering examples in designing such a process, and focusing on the role of various actors, including government agencies and the private sector.
The session then addressed the designing of technology needs assessments and selection of priority areas in terms of relevant technologies.
It concluded with presentations and discussions on the integration of technology needs with current development programmes.
enb_long_title: Expert meeting on methodologies for technology needs assessments
